attrib:
HP REGEN: 10
BONUS FROM ATTRIBUTE: 5% / 10% / 15% / 20%
BONUS WHEN HURT: 20% / 40% / 60% / 80%
cmb:
MANA COST: 170/170/170/170
COOLDOWN: 25/22/19/16
desc: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 40% it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.
notes:
The HP percentage is checked every second and the regeneration adjusted accordingly.
Can be cast on magic immune units.
lore: While Huskar has little use for magic, this minor enchantment was learned from the Dazzle and the Dezun priests, to be used in times of great injury.
name: huskar_inner_vitality

affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 0/0/0/0
COOLDOWN: 0
desc: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts 8 seconds.
notes:
Burning Spears stacks additively when used multiple times on one target. There is no cap.
Huskar cannot kill himself with this skill.
lore: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.
name: huskar_burning_spear

attrib:
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 14 / 16 / 18 / 20
BONUS RESISTANCE: 4% / 5% / 6% / 7%
desc: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic resistance based on missing health.
notes: Maximum bonus (14 stacks) is achieved when Huskar has strictly less than 3% of his maximum HP.
lore: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.
name: huskar_berserkers_blood

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
SLOW: 40% / 50% / 60%
SLOW DURATION: 4 / 5 / 6
DAMAGE TAKEN: 35%
DAMAGE DEALT: 35%
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 4
SCEPTER DAMAGE DEALT: 65%
cmb:
MANA COST: 0/0/0
COOLDOWN: 12
desc:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to inflict a percentage of that hero's current HP, and slow at the cost of his own vitality. While leaping, Huskar is magic immune. Slow lasts 5 seconds.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
If Huskar is disabled during the charge or the target moves more than 1400 units in 0.015 seconds, the charge stops.
Slow works on magic immune units.
Life Break cannot be disjointed.
lore: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.
name: huskar_life_break
